text: Byron is a town in the American state of Wyoming. It part of Big Horn County. At the 2020 census, 562 people lived in Byron. In high school, students go to Rocky Mountain High School in Byron. Middle School students go to Rocky Mountain Middle School in Deaver and elementary school students attend Rocky Mountain Elementary School in Cowley. The town has an area of 0.9 mi². 0.1 mi² of it (4.93%) is water. == References == Category:Towns in Wyoming Category:Big Horn County, Wyoming
title: Byron, Wyoming
